overview:
A 20-year enterprise software and Internet veteran, Allen Bonde is currently CMO at The Pulse Network and an investor in social marketing tools provider Offerpop, where he was previously a co-founder and CMO. Prior to Offerpop he was SVP and CMO at eVergance (acquired by KANA), held consulting and practice leadership roles at McKinsey, Extraprise and the Yankee Group, and has advised numerous software start-ups. Recently named as one of the top CMOs on Twitter, Allen has organized and chaired the past 3 Inbound Marketing Summit events, is a contributor to several publications including 1to1Media, eMedia Vitals and Forbes.com, and has made guest appearances on CNBC and Fox News as an e-commerce expert.

Allen lives outside Boston with his wife, 3 kids, and yellow lab, loves all things about cars and plays a mean bass guitar in a semi-award-winning indie rock band.
